cab.content: (This DocMfflttttIs the Property r-f Colonel Jones His Britannic Majesty'* Governs M 1,1 - 1 1 s g c R-E-T:-- perations *From: - C-in-C., France.To:- C.I.G.S., War Office. 1.11.17 Despatched. 10.20 p.m. Received 11.30 p.m.O.A.B/3. 9.25 p..m. November 1st. G.O.C., R.F.C. reports to me as follows.Begins: During night of Oct. 31st-Nov. 1st cloudswere below 1000 feet rendering operations by theNancy squadrons impossible. One formation to-dayin the attack on Kaisers Lautern failed to reach itand had to drop their bombs in the open countrybehind tho trench line in order to fight a Germanformation. Ends.Secretary, War Cabinet. ^ Circulated for the information of theMembers of the War Cabinet.General Staff, War Office. 2nd November, 1917..
